classes.components

Class DoUndoEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • classes.components.DoUndoEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Recorder, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class DoUndoEngine
extends java.lang.Object
implements Recorder, java.lang.Cloneable
    Immutable object also called caretaker. It knows how, why and when to store and restore this originator BoardReceiver

      • record

        public void record(Memento memento)
            throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                   java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
        Record the memento in the backward stack and empty the forward stack for new changes. It empties the forward stack when a new Command is called
        Parameters:
        memento - to store
        Throws:
